content: bring your labubu doll s personality to life with a handmade outfit that s anything but ordinary stitched in red heart super saver or red heart super saver stripes this crochet hat and dress set is worked in the round using basic techniques like chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet and slip_stitch designed exclusively for everyone s favorite toothy-grinned monster this pattern is offered in 2 playful colorways to delight your imagination materials version 1 red heart® super saver® 5 oz/141 g 236 yds/215 m wildflower 3955 1 ball or 23 5 yds/21 5 m for hat and 21 yds/19 5 m for dress version 2 red heart® super saver® stripes™ 5 oz/141 g 236 yds/215 m retro stripe 4971 1 ball or 23 5 yds/21 5 m for hat and 21 yds/19 5 m for dress measurements to fit 6 15 cm monster
